Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Marketing major or Marketing minor, and MAR 3023 with a grade of "B" (3.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: The communication processes that form the basis of professional selling to businesses and to individuals. Focus is on applied exercises and role-play situations.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: ACG 2021 and ECO 2013 or ECO 2023 each with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better, and consent of Honors.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Study of how firms create and communicate value in order to build and maintain customer relationships while benefitting the organization and its stakeholders; course has honors content.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: MAR 3023 with a "B" (3.0) or better and appropriate major or minor.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: An overview of the sales management process. Emphasis on sales program formulation and implementation.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Marketing major or Marketing minor, and MAR 3023 with a grade of "B" (3.0) or better, and consent of the Honors College.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: The communication processes that form the basis of professional selling to business and to individuals. Focus is on applied exercises and role-play situations.

MAR3203 - Supply Chain and Operations Ma.name: MAR3203 - Supply Chain and Operations Management

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Completion of each course in the Business common program prerequisites with a "C" (2.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Study of the planning and management of all activities involved in processes, assets, and flows of materials and information to meet customers' needs.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Marketing Minor and MAR 3023 with a "B" (3.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Planning and execution of advertising, sales promotion, and public relations programs consistent with integrated marketing communications programs.

MAR3203H - Honors Supply Chain and Opera.name: MAR3203H - Honors Supply Chain and Operations Management

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Completion of each course in the Business common program prerequisites with a "C" (2.0) or better, and consent of the Honors College.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Study of the planning and management of all activities involved in processes, assets, and flows of materials and information to meet customers' needs.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Marketing minor and MAR 3023 with a "B" (3.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Application of marketing theory and tools to the marketing of products and services in the entertainment industry.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: ACG 2021 and ECO 2013 or ECO 2023 each with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better, or for non-business majors, ECO 2013 or ECO 2023 with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Study of how firms create and communicate value in order to build and maintain customer relationships while benefitting the organization and its stakeholders.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Admission to the professional selling track in the Marketing major or to the Professional Selling minor.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Advanced study of the professional selling process, including team selling, negotiating, customer conflict management, and CRM systems.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Admission to the Marketing major.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Individuals, groups, or organizations and the processes utilized to select, secure, use, and dispose of products, services, or experiences to satisfy consumer needs and wants.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Admission to the Marketing major or the Professional Selling minor.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Study of the effective strategic management of contemporary sales forces. Emphasis on sales program formulation, implementation, and control, with a focus on strategy.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: MAR 4415C with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Advanced study of selected contemporary strategic issues in selling and sales management.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Admission to the Integrated Business major.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Study of marketing decision making in services sectors. Primary focus is on the unique aspects of services that impact marketing decision making in small and medium-size enterprises.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: MAR 3615 with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: The acquisition of information using various marketing research methods, as well as the application of results to marketing decision making.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Marketing minor and MAR 3023 with a "B" (3.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Contemporary sources and applications of information concerning external forces impacting marketing decision making.

MAR3611 - Marketing Analysis and Researc.name: MAR3611 - Marketing Analysis and Research Methods

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Marketing minor or Professional Selling minor, and MAR 3023 with a "B" (3.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Study of the analytical tools and research methods used by marketers to make more effective decisions.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: MAR 3613 with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Study of the theory and practice of managing innovation and product design, testing, branding, and introduction of new products.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Marketing minor and MAR 3023 with a "B" (3.0) or better, or admission to the Entrepreneurship certificate or the Entrepreneurship minor or the Technological Entrepreneurship minor.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Exploration of how marketing and entrepreneurship affect and are affected by one another.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Marketing Minor and MAR 3611 with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Planning, organizing, implementing, monitoring and controlling marketing programs to effectively compete in dynamic and diverse business environments.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Marketing minor and MAR 3023 with a "B" (3.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: The field of retailing. Emphasis on planning for profitability through demand forecasting, inventory control, customer relationship management and brand leadership.

MAR4934 - Contemporary Marketing Topics.name: MAR4934 - Contemporary Marketing Topics in Florida

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Marketing minor and MAR 3023 with a "B" (3.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Advanced study of marketing topics relevant to major business sectors in the state of Florida, e.g., high technology, health care, sustainable marketing, housing, real estate, tourism, hospitality, sports, gaming, etc. Topics may vary from term to term.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Admission to the marketing major.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Examination of marketing in services industries, with particular emphasis on unique aspects of services marketing, the service marketing mix, and the implementation of services strategies.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Admission to the marketing major.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: The application of contemporary digital media technologies to marketing decision making.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: MAR 3023 Marketing

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Analyze business scenarios to develop integrated marketing and sales plans with creative strategies and innovative tactics in Business-to-Business and Business-to-Consumer markets.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: MAR 3613 with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Marketing issues are explored, with emphasis on strategy formulation and integrative marketing decision making.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Marketing minor and MAR 3023 with a "B" (3.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Marketing as it applies to the sport and leisure industry.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Marketing minor and MAR 3023 with a "B" (3.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Investigates strategy, policy and the variables relevant to international marketing decisions.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Admission to the Marketing major.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Study of analytic methods, tools, processes, and technologies that enable marketers to evaluate the success of marketing activities and initiatives.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Admission to the Marketing major or minor, and application to and approval by the Department of Marketing.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Provides student with supervised, market-related work experience in a sponsoring organization. Application and approval required.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Marketing minor and MAR 3023 with a "B" (3.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Marketing as it applies to healthcare manufacturers, intermediaries and providers.
